item.description:
Good news everyone!
After not putting up a poll for the February book, I decided to crib from the Hugo award nomination list from this year and picked one that sounded good :-) The book for this month will be Boneshaker by Cherie Priest. Boneshaker combines the steampunk genre with zombies in an alternate history version of Seattle, Washington. Do I have your attention yet?

I am putting the Meetup location as Pandemonium but if I find a new place I will update the location. There is a lot around the corner from Pandemonium on Green Street ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there!
-Josh
item.name: February Book Club Meeting
